revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''UpdateWaterLevel'''([bool ''splash''])
== Usage == Updates the Actor's water level. Also handles diving and surfacing sounds if the Actor is a player. Usually called after the Actor moved.
=== Parameters === *''splash'' - True by default. If true, create a splash if the Actor hit liquid.
=== Return value === Returns false if the splash was already handled. Always returns false since splashing is handled by the ''splash'' flag.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
